name: rock, letter, BOOM
description:
Controls: 
A or Left Arrow to move left
D or Right Arrow to move right
Left Mouse Click on letters to form words

Avoid rocks and click letters to form the expected words to beat Dr. L by reaching the end!

#ChainLetterJam

If nominated, you have two weeks to make a 60 second game in some way inspired by the game that nominated you.

Once finished, put #ChainLetterJam in your game description, a link to the game that nominated you, and then nominate two other devs (or less or more, whatever, this isn't a chain letter where you die in three days if you don't).

I was nominated by Word Hero Rises and as part of the jam, I took inspiration from Saul's game and tried to clearly show how it inspired me!

Where the jam started: Wordman Saves The Day!
